backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a blog backend with CRUD operations for posts (create, read, update, delete), like functionality, and comment system, using a Map to store posts with ownership-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing a family blog application with routing, post management, comments, likes, and a warm coral/peach themed UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a neutral grayscale color palette in OKLCH format for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Family Journey' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining routes for home, post detail, create, and edit pages, all wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/CommentForm.tsx: Form component for submitting comments with author name and content fields, including validation, loading states, and form clearing on success.
frontend/src/components/CommentsList.tsx: Displays a list of comments with author, timestamp, and content, showing an empty state when no comments exist.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Alert dialog component for confirming post deletion with warning message and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header banner image, navigation bar with home button, main content outlet, and footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on blog posts (get all, get one, create, update, delete, like) and comments, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm coral/peach color palette for light and dark modes, using OKLCH color space and custom typography settings for a family blog aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page for creating new blog posts with title, author name, and content fields, including validation and navigation back to home on success.
frontend/src/pages/EditPostPage.tsx: Form page for editing existing blog posts by ID, pre-populating title and content from fetched post data with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a sorted list of all blog posts with excerpts, publication dates, and author info, plus a button to create new posts.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: React component that displays a single blog post with full details including title, author, date, content, like functionality, and embedded comments section. Handles post deletion, navigation, and loading/error states with skeleton UI.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography settings, container queries, animations, and extended theme properties including custom colors (coral, peach, cream) and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata file for "Family Journey" application containing schema version, architectural notes, known issues, and feature tracking with clarification mode set to instant.
